A trigger_condition function

Source: R/TriggerByCalendarTime.R
TriggerByCalendarTime.Rd

A trigger_condition function to find data lock time at specified calendar time. This can be passed to trigger_condition when creating an `Event`.

Usage

TriggerByCalendarTime(trial = NULL, event_name, calendar_time, arms = NULL)

Arguments

trial

a Trial object.

event_name

character. Name of event. It should be the same as Event$get_name().

calendar_time

numeric. Calendar time to trigger the event.

arms

a vector of arms' name on which triggering condition is tested.

Value

data lock time (calendar), so that the `Event` class can lock data.

On this page

Developed by Han Zhang.
